alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 01 at 12:53PM PST until February 04 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 8 AM PST FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...The majority of the San Joaquin Valley, excluding Fresno and Bakersfield. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 8 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
